CustomField.inlineHelpText: If yes, include design details for approval if the flume length is less than 30.5 m; tower is less than 3.05 m; or flow rates are less than 3.6 m/sec. If waterslide does not meet this criteria, obtain approval from BC Safety Authority. Reference the Safety Standards Act â€“ Elevating Devices Safety Regulation Section 18.2a
CustomField.label: Waterslide
